mapper.insert: insert into camp_users (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_nick_name, user_email, user_phone_number, user_type) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{type})
mapper.select: select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_nick_name as nickName, user_email as email, user_phone_number as phoneNumber, user_type as type from camp_users where user_id = #{value}

select user_id as id, user_password as password, user_name as name, user_nick_name as nickName, user_email as email, user_phone_number as phoneNumber, user_type as type from camp_users where user_name = #{value}
